[Adjust Tax Rate]
Today's tax rate is %tax_rate%%. Tomorrow's tax rate will be %next_tax_rate%%.
You may choose a new rate in the range of 0% - %tax_limit%%. If you choose a new tax rate, it will become effective beginning at midnight on the same day.
Please note that the tax rate will be automatically set to 0% if you press the "OK" button without entering a value.

Rate %
